case.name: Secret technique
case.description: Sheena uses a ninja technique to let her pants dissappear.

trigger.state: This feels even more embarrassing than facing Mizuho after the Volt incident.
This is even worse than being peeped on in the hot springs!
Do you know how long it took me to realise why I still had to train this technique in front of my Sensei, even though I've mastered it already?

case.name: Summon Spirit
case.description: Sheena is about to show her panties but don't wear any. In panic she starts to summon a spirit. Who she summons is defined by markers.

trigger.state: Fine... I lost and now have to strip down to my... WHAT THE..! I call upon the disciple of everlasting ice. I summon thee... Come, Celsius!
Damn! I lost again... But I came prepared and have chosen my favorite pant... Wait, I didn't!? Undine, help!
I lost? Alright, I'll have to strip... Please don't stare at my... Where are my..? I call upon the heavenly messengers. I summon thee... come, Sylph!
I know, I know... I have to show you my... Ahh! That's not what I wanted to show! I call upon the light of the heaven. I summon thee... come, Luna!

case.name: Zelos' size
case.description: She somehow knows about the penis size of a perverted firend. But she won't tell why.

trigger.state: Oh, please don't ask how I know about that pervert's size. It's a long story...

case.name: Perverted rule
case.description: She was not aware about the masturbation part.

trigger.state: W-wait! I thought ~name~ was already out. What kind of perv came up with this rule!?

case.name: Summoning Event
case.description: Sheena summons a spirit while undressing. Which spirit she summons is defined by marker in her must strip phase. The default case won't play.
